t=int(raw_input())
for _ in range(t):
    s=int(raw_input())
    if s>0:
        arr=map(int,raw_input().split())
        dp=[0]*s
        dp[0]=arr[0]
        if s>1:
            dp[1]=max(arr[0],arr[1])
        if s>2:
            for i in range(2,s):
                dp[i]=max(dp[i-2]+arr[i], dp[i-1])
            
        print dp[s-1]
    else:
        print 0
